name: Ayashi Kazokukeikaku
nutshell: Ordinary Kenichi meets an ordinary woman named Hime, they date and get married. But it turns out his wife has a big secret and when tries to surprise her on their first year anniversary with a new puppy, things take a turn for the bizarre! Why is Hime suddenly a guy!?

name: Endo Ryoko Doesn't Hold Back
nutshell:
MC's classmate drops on by.
4 page twitter manga from @Yuzuchiri

name: Maou No Musume-Tachi To Ma Guwa Eba Tsuyoku Narerutte Hontou Desu Ka?
nutshell:
両親を殺され孤児となったウタ＝レインは、ついに奴隷として競売にかけられてしまう。
どこへ連れていかれようとまた酷い仕打ちを受けるに違いないと絶望するウタを待ち受けていたのは……
豪華な食事と5人の可愛いお姉さんだった。
でも、彼女たちは16年前に勇者に倒された魔王の娘たちで――!?
ウタの運命が大きく変わり始める!

name: Master Has Chosen My Husband Candidates
nutshell:
I first met the teacher when I was born. He claimed to be a distant relative and raised me who was born in an orphanage. I grew up well under his care. I was planning to confess my love and get married to Master when I would finally come of age... But master disappeared on the day I came of age?! After receiving such a huge impact, 5 years passed, and then I received a letter from the teacher!
"I have been searching for a husband for you in the last 5 years."
I kept the store open and kept waiting for the Master to come back... But none of the men that showed up was the Master. Come back home!



Original Webtoon <Naver>


Original Webtoon <Yes24>


Original Webtoon <Lezhin>


Original Webtoon <Aladin>


Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>


Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>


Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>


Original Webtoon <BookCube>


Original Webtoon <Peanutoon>


Original Webtoon <Joara Webtoon>

name: [switch] - Early Days (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A story set before the beginning of the main series. Masataka and Keigo figure out how to work together as partners.

name: Vampire and Hunter
nutshell: Long ago, a young boy named Libra Brian wandered into the vampire Lasombra's castle and became smitten, swearing that one day he would marry him. Libra grew up to become a vampire hunter, but his love for Lasombra never faded and the two eventually become lovers. Hundreds of years later, the vampire awakens from a long sleep to find his human paramour still alive, but to Libra's dismay, Lasombra has lost all memories of the love they once shared, and the vampire now believes his long-time human companion is actually an enemy plotting to kill him! How can Libra rekindle their romance and help his amnesiac lover learn to navigate the modern world when every move he makes is considered a plot to destroy him?

name: Heartbeat
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Video Games,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A girl pressured into good behavior and a boy who has no ambitions, these two connected by a misunderstanding from a diary, leading to an interesting and stimulating game of decryption… As the emotions of adolescence germinate in this game of misunderstanding, the distance between the both of them gradually shortens, with them finding out that two completely different people are facing the same problems…

name: CHANGE-R
nutshell: Hikari Hayakawa switched bodies with a wanted criminal, and is being chased down by the police.

name: The Honest Man's Stroll
nutshell: In a small town lives an honest man. He is admired by most but begrudged by one who is determined to take his place.

name: Idol-sama no Dekiai Kiss!
nutshell:
A mediocre clerk, Chiyo, suddenly becomes the manager of the super popular idol duo Drips!
A member, Yusuke Kazusa, confessed that he liked you!?
Scandal love loved by dense H!

name: Wakeari Kiss
nutshell:
From Senpai Scans:
Yamabuki-kun is a flashy playboy - someone who's completely different from Mosako. But when he miraculously grows a pair of cat ears, she's the only one who can help him…by kissing him?!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Matsuribayashi-hen
nutshell:
In the final "answer arc" of the New York Times bestselling series, the final pieces of the mystery in Hinamizawa fall into place!
When her parents are killed in a terrible train accident, a young Miyo Takano is sent to live at an orphanage deep in the mountains. Little does she know that her parents' deaths are just the beginning of her hell, as the institution is run by a group of greedy, cruel men who care nothing for the grief-stricken girl. Subjected to abuses beyond imagining, Miyo and her roommates plan to escape, despite rumors of the terrible punishments that have befallen past runaways... [Yen Press]

name: Mary Stayed Out All Night
nutshell:
Mary meets a death metal group's vocalist and falls in love with him. Although he is very handsome his personality is not that good. Will those two finally become a couple or will Mary's logic, that it's telling her to not get involved with him, prevails?
This was adapted into a K-Drama under the same name in November 2010.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Survivor 2 —Show Your Free Will—
nutshell: The setting of Devil Survivor 2 spans the whole country of Japan. It tells the story of Japanese high-school students who receive emails from a website foretelling their friend's deaths. Mysterious creatures invade the country, and the students enter a pact, enabling them to summon demons from their cell phones with a special Devil Summoning App.

name: Ouji-sama Nante Iranai
nutshell:
Via Google Translate:
Kotoko Tojo is a very ordinary high school girl who exercises, studies, and looks normal.  The only thing that isn't typical is that she has a childhood-friend fiancé! Moreover, her partner, Isho Nishizono, is the best handsome prince in school! Kotoko is in a situation which many envy, but for some reason she's desperately hiding the engagement.
The opening of the Doki LOVE Gakuen Romance of the ordinary girls and the prince of the school ♪

name: Pieces of You
nutshell: A short story filled with the dark truths about adulthood and society. How would you face the reality when you know you are trapped in its cycle and routine?

name: Mannen D-rank no Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi de Densetsu no Ken wo Hikkonuku
nutshell: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.

name: Ranker
nutshell: <Ranker>, An online membership game run in secrecy. Kang Junseo coincidentally jumped into Ranker. Junseo from who knows when, started to see his opponents as monsters and it was his player, Jeongjun’s voice that allowed him to find his calm again. With Jeongjun, Junseo is prepared to heal the symptoms. However, Ranker is not only a quest where your life is at stake, it is filled with characters battling each other and the constant threat of being hunted.

name: Locke the Superman Classic
nutshell: Locke the Superman first began as Doujinshi series and now those stories have been recollected. "Nimbus and the World of Contrast," "My Love For the Universe," and other long out-of-print Locke the Superman titles from the Sakuga Group era are published again to commemorate the 40th anniversary of King's serialization! A book of rarities that fans must have!

name: The Mermaid and...
nutshell: A mermaid encounters a suicidal man standing on the edge of a cliff.

name: A Ghost & A Hug
nutshell: Twitter short series by @SORAji34

name: Skull Man (SHIMAMOTO Kazuhiko)
nutshell:
They took his family, they took his face, and they took his soul.
Locked between the lethal but gorgeous assassin Maria and the mutant Spider Man, the Skull Man digs into the conspiracy that gave birth to his powers and those of his partner, Garo.
Haunted by his past, he will not let them stand in the way of his revenge.

name: Mane of the Wind
nutshell:
Sou and Hazumi were raised like brother and sister. Then, one night, a strange light flashed in Sou's eyes, and he disappeared. Four years later, Hazumi spots someone who looks just like Sou in a magazine. Determined to solve the mystery, Hazumi takes her fox puppet and heads to Tokyo... Get ready for a magical, suspenseful love story!
From Manga Reborn

name: Fantasy Gamer (New)
nutshell: Davis and his fiancee Sophina are two college students who do game testing on the side for a living. One day they are sent through the mail a new virtual reality game called "Fantasy World Live" Excited about testing out their first virtual reality game they open up the box right away to find nothing,but a strange cube inside which by touching the blue button it teleports them into a unknown fantasy world. Now they must find a way to survive this world and get back home.

name: Bocchama wa Ijiwaru
nutshell: Rich young Master comes across a girl alone and abandoned during Christmas. He decides to take her in and name her "Mike". Now he's in high school and she's his personal maid. Did I mention she now loves him and he's rather sadistic with a terrible panty fetish?

name: Kamuya Ride
nutshell: The hero, Kamuya Ride, stands on the boundary line between the god and human worlds. He's the only one who can stop a mysterious man from awakening the previously sealed Earthly Deities from their 200 year slumber. Alongside Kamuya Ride is the Prince of the Yamato, a powerful bloodline responsible for the Earthly Deities' fall from power years ago. Can these two close the Earthly Deities' gates into the human world and staunch the growing rebellions in the land?

name: Hatsukamaroudo -Peppermint Girls-
nutshell: In a very common high-rise apartment building, suddenly a mysterious girl appears at someone's balcony! What is she trying to do?

name: The Twin Empires
nutshell: In a world where warships fly across the skies, Kou and Qing are at war. Gaw, a Kong Xia survivor whose people were exterminated by the Kou now travels with a girl named Fa, who has been cursed by a magician so that all who touch her lose their lives. They now journey together to find a magician who can lift Fa’s curse, though magicians are thought to have died out long ago.

name: Doonggule Tea!
nutshell:
Blue Dragon, Red Phoenix, White Tiger, and Black Tortoise.
To stop the sacred spirits of the Heavenly Realm wreaking havoc in the world of humans, successors of the Four Deities are born in each generation to guard the barrier with the Heavenly Realm, using the powers of the four sacred spirits. And the place they gather to train before they ascend to heaven is Doonggule, a traditional tea house in a small country town.

name: Confessions
nutshell:
The ultimate revenge.
"From now on, I will refer to them as Suspect A and Suspect B." Ms. Jang is moving on from teaching after her daughter was found dead in the school pool. Her death was deemed a tragic accident, but Ms. Jang suspects otherwise. And before she resigns, she's about to reveal a shocking truth.
Based on a Japanese Novel and manga of the same name by Nanae Minato
